abstract: Rokha Journal; insurgents attack Forward Operating Base Lion, roadside outpost that is one of last vestiges of United States presence in Afghanistan's Panjshir Province; although there are no casualties, Afghans worry that attack has pierced inviolability of valley that has fended off both Soviets and Taliban.
snippet: After years of the stable and fiercely independent Panjshir Valley being overlooked by insurgents, the war finally found its way here on Saturday morning.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: After years of the stable and fiercely independent Panjshir Valley being overlooked by insurgents, the war finally found its way here on Saturday morning.

headline.main: Failed Attack on U.S. Base Rattles an Afghan Valley
headline.print_headline: Failed Attack on U.S. Base Rattles an Afghan Valley
headline.seo: Failed Attack on U.S. Base Rattles Panjshir Valley in Afghanistan
